text: Maseeh ne kabhi is baat ko aar (disdain) nahin samjha ke woh Allah ka banda ho, aur na muqarrab-tareen farishtey isko apne liye aar (disdain) samajhte hain. Agar koi Allah ki bandagi ko apne liye aar samajhta hai aur taqabbur karta hai to ek waqt aayega jab Allah sabko gher kar apne saamne haazir karega
